title: Introduction to Programming
description: A beginner-friendly course covering the fundamentals of programming using Python.

title: Advanced JavaScript
description: An in-depth course exploring advanced JavaScript concepts, including closures, promises, and async/await.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: Learn the essential data structures and algorithms, focusing on optimization techniques and time complexity.

title: Web Development with React
description: A comprehensive guide to building modern web applications with React and state management.

title: Machine Learning Basics
description: An introductory course to machine learning concepts, including supervised learning, regression, and classification.
